reviews.text: Stayed at the Bellamar from the 14th - 22nd September 2007. Chose this hotel based on the reviews from Tripadvisor and I certainly made a good choice. I think this hotel deserves it's four star status.
reviews.title: Blissimo Bellamar - Have fab time, great hotel

likes.disliked: — Having to leave and go home!!

reviews.text: Location: Based at the end of San Antoni Bay 10 mins from Eden & Es Paridis if you use the use short cut next to the Hawaai or 15 mins if you use the promanade pathway. A quiet area to stay, unlike if you stay further into the bay. I stayed at the Arenal in June and often heard clubbers on their way home but no such problems at the Bellamar. Found the noise from upper floors very minor and would only ocassionaly hear someone walking around in their high heels which wasn't a problem as it didn't occur often enough to be annoying.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small but pleasant beach across the road from the hotel. Take some bread down with you and be amazed at the amount fish that appear from nowhere to feed - great fun, one of daily activiites. Bus stops right outside the hotel on the main road and a taxi rank based on the first road to the left of the hotel. Sometimes taxis can be hard to get by the roadside but just have a bit patience and you will get one. Local supermarket & tobacconist to left of the hotel to pick up essentials.
reviews.title: Good hotel but resort not for me.
excellent overall but food somtimes disappointing
reviews.text: Location: Very close to all the pubs & clubs that are in the bay only 5 - 6 euro's to Cafe del Mar & Cafe Mumbo which are further round the harbour if you didn't feel like walking, No more than 25 Euro's to any of the big clubs outside the bay ie El Divinio, Amensia, Pacha. Boat taxi just across the road at the beginning of the promenade which takes you to various other beaches for around 3 Euros.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel. Arrived here after a couple of days at the Tivoli Apts in Playa D'en Bossa - don't do the Tivoli!!
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: We are two people in our late 20s/early 30s - looking for a bit of partying but overall a relaxing time - and the Bellamar provided that.
reviews.title: Decent stay in Ibiza

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at the hotel are very helpful and knowledgeable. The rooms are clean. The pool area was great - a wee bit small - but we didn't have a problem in getting a sunbed. The restaurant was great too - all you can eat buffet with a good selection - and i am usually not a fan of "all you can eat".
reviews.title: Great hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would recommend this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Really Good Location

likes.disliked: — I know it sounds sad but lack of English speaking TV channels. You need the TV when the wife takes so long to get ready.

reviews.text: We requested a room for 3 people which we believed was possible but on arrival it was a double room with a camper bed on the side so a bit close for comfort.
reviews.title: Excellet Hotel - Will Stay Again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First of all I must say that this is a decent hotel, it is not, however, as fabulous as some reviewers on here would have you believe. It is just an ordinary meditteranean hotel. It is true that it is kept very clean, the staff are polite and efficient and our seaview room had a good view. The room was purely functional in a businessman's hotel type way, nothing to write home about though. Breakfast had the usual choice of most Spanish hotels.
reviews.title: Don't build up your hopes.........

reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel as a place to stay if you are visiting San Antonio but don't let the reviews build up a picture that you are going to be staying at some top -notch hotel - I have stayed in worse places, I have also stayed in better. It is a good place to be if you want to be well away from the hell that is the town centre.The pool area was absolutley packed like sardines when we were there last week -all sunbeds right on top of each other - too close for my liking! No plans to go back to this resort. Unless your'e an empty headed 20 something, one of the army of tatooed chavs slobbing around the place or one of the dozy slappers on a tired old hen party visit there's not much for you, 'cos apart from being a bit of a dump sophisticated it ain't!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Good stay at the Bellamar

likes.liked: — Nothing in particular, just overall ticked all the boxes
likes.disliked: — There was a whole football team complete with wags when we stayed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel during a lads holiday to Ibiza. It's situated close enough to the nightlife for it to be accessible without transport/taxi (water taxi is there to saver on the legs though) but far enough for it not to be intrusive.
reviews.title: Gorgeous hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Most of the hotels in the area are 3 star while this is 4, half board accomodation was the norm when we went and the food was varied and of a high standard.
reviews.title: Good Hotel in San Antonio

likes.disliked: — double bed never available..both times I've stayed!!

reviews.text: There was free wireless in the lounge which was handy as these were quite geeky lads, a few of the rooms just about managed to clip the wirless so you can go on your phone/laptop in the room.
reviews.title: Excellent value and quality for money! No Chavs!

likes.liked: — The quality of the pool, rooms and food.
